data.name: DVOREC
data.detailed_description:
"DVOREC" is a story-driven RPG. Its actions take place in the largest, most expensive and famous building in the country and in the vast territories adjacent to it. The main character is Sanya - an ordinary guy who accidentally got into the epicenter of political life and now the fate of people, nations and entire states depends on his decisions. "DVOREC" is a vibrant satirical RPG game. Classic combat turn-based mode, like in JRPG. Beautiful characters with humor, a lot of dialogues and stories.

Features:

- Turn-based combat system.
- A well-developed combat system in which everyone can find their own style.
- Unusual plot.
- A combination of tricks and spells.
- Memorable soundtrack.
- A unique control system that allows you to play with one hand.
- A huge number of well-written characters, each of which is able to tell their own story.

data.short_description: DVOREC is a game inspired by the loud investigation of someone whose name should not be called. Find yourself in the center of political events, international scandals and simply relax in the aquadiskotheque on the territory of the "hotel", completely recreated according to the drawings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
